name: unarmoured
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person or vehicle) not wearing or covered in strong protection : They taught unarmoured men how to kill using everyday weapons. They wore bulletproof vests but no helmets as they sat in their unarmoured truck. Compare
armoured UK
More examplesFewer examplesSome supply vehicles are unarmoured, though they travel in convoys with armoured vehicles.Driving an unarmoured 10-ton truck across the war zone was like playing Russian roulette. He was killed when his unarmoured Humvee ran over a roadside bomb.It is not clear how many of the military deaths involved soldiers in unarmoured vehicles.
